summary: This document is a letter from an unnamed individual at Deutsche Bank authorizing Hwy Beller to have signing authority on the account of Hyperion Air, Inc. The letter is addressed to Amanda Kirby and indicates a formal request for banking authorization.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the recipient of the letter from Deutsche Bank regarding the signing authority for Hyperion Air, Inc.

persons.name: Hwy Beller
persons.context: Hwy Beller is mentioned as the individual granted signing authority on the account of Hyperion Air, Inc.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 2th Fl, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: The document is a letter of authorization for Hwy Beller to have signing authority on the account of Hyperion Air, Inc.
The letter is addressed to Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank.
The document is marked as confidential.
